thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 43 of 61
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: I have been shopping through SSENSE for many years now, and I am consistently very happy with this site. Their selection of products is amazing. In addition, I always receive timely responses to any questions I have about products. Finally, their shipping and returns processes are stellar. I always receive my order within 2-3 days and have never had a problem returning something that I didn't like upon arrival.
